articles.description: Stephane Peterhansel has responded to the comments made by Nasser Al-Attiyah and believes the Toyota driver lost the 2021 Dakar Rally because he was too egoistic to win the Prologue.
articles.content: X-raid Mini driver Peterhansel clinched a record-extending 14th Dakar title on Friday, beating Al-Attiyah by just under 15 minutes in what was effectively a two-horse race between the duo for victory… [+2649 chars]

articles.title: Conor McGregor would ‘love’ to welcome Nate Diaz back to lightweight, possibly with a title on the line - MMA Fighting
articles.description: Conor McGregor still has his sights set on finishing a trilogy with Nate Diaz and if the former “BMF” title contender is returning to lightweight, he could even see a title fight opportunity.
